Translations.Text: (O vos prophet when believing femina relinquit disbelievers) seek asylum vos pledge vos they non set any idols DEUS nor steal nor commit adultery, nor kill their infans nor fabricate any falsehood nor disobey tuus righteous orders vos accept their pledge pray DEUS forgive them! DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
O vos believe perfecit non befriend people DEUS est angry qui hopelessly stuck disbelief; they est just prout hopeless prout disbelievers est iam graves
Glorifying DEUS est everything caelum everything terra! He est Almighty Wise
O vos believe vos dictus quod vos non perfecit
abominable in sight DEUS est ut vos dictus quod vos non perfecit
DEUS loves those fight in His CAUSA united 1 column bricks 1 wall
Recall ut Moses dictus to his people O my people perfecit vos hurt me et vos know ut ego est deus messenger vos? When they deviated DEUS diverted their hearts Pro DEUS non guide wicked people
